body_html:
This Eigen patch fixes half the problem, so I think you are going in the right direction. Solves the error:

external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/ProductEvaluators.h:648:24: error: no matching function for call to ‘pset1(int)’
res = pset1(0);

but not the error:

external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/GenericPacketMath.h:324:10: error: could not convert 'a' from 'const Eigen::internal::Packet8h' to 'Eigen::internal::unpacket_traits<Eigen::internal::Packet8h>::type {aka Eigen::half}'
 { return a; }

I'm trying to fix this but I'm unable to find a solutions after few hours.

Best regards.

 { return a; }

I'm trying to fix this but I'm unable to find a solutions after few hours.
Best regards.
body:
This Eigen patch fixes half the problem, so I think you are going in the right direction. Solves the error:

```
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/ProductEvaluators.h:648:24: error: no matching function for call to ‘pset1(int)’
res = pset1(0);
```

but not the error:

```
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/GenericPacketMath.h:324:10: error: could not convert 'a' from 'const Eigen::internal::Packet8h' to 'Eigen::internal::unpacket_traits<Eigen::internal::Packet8h>::type {aka Eigen::half}'
 { return a; }
```

I'm trying to fix this but I'm unable to find a solutions after few hours.

Best regards.
